title: Extraction, purification and in vitro assessment of the antioxidant and anti-inflammatory activity of policosanols from non-psychoactive Cannabis sativa L.
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Clarissa Caroli, Giovanna Baron, Giorgio Cappellucci, Virginia Brighenti, Larissa Della Vedova, Francesca Fraulini, Simonetta Oliaro-Bosso, Andrea Alessandrini, Alfonso Zambon, Gigliola Lusvardi, Giancarlo Aldini, Marco Biagi, Lorenzo Corsi, Federica Pellati
